column5: Hey folks. found this on another board. Hope he finds it.  although i have almost given up hope here's hoping.I was out off duclos point on saturday and believe I walked away and my flasher fell off my sled. its a brand new marcum v1. I was hoping that maybe one of the fine members of this board happened to pick it up. I'll give the person 50 bucks. for its return.  mods, can I post the link to another board on here?
Man, that's the worst feeling,   Like loosing your wallet with a wad of cash in it.
Go ahead and post the link, if it helps him find it who cares?
Wow , he is lucky . I guess there is alot of good people out there after all  !
